about_the_game:
Dive into the vibrant world of Chaotic Good Boy, a groundbreaking 2D RPG that challenges the conventional hero narrative by placing players in the paws of a dog.

This game combines heartwarming storytelling, inventive gameplay mechanics, and a soundtrack that resonates with every twist and turn of the adventure. As the beloved pet of a band of adventurers who find themselves captured by a nefarious force, it falls to you to muster all your canine cunning and courage to save them.

Chaotic Good Boy redefines the inventory system with a novel approach where items are buried and retrieved. The game's fun and engaging storyline are brought to life through interactions with a host of interesting characters, each adding depth and humor to the quest. As players explore, they will discover new mechanics and challenges that keep the gameplay fresh and exciting from start to finish.

A game about loyalty, bravery, and the unbreakable bonds of friendship. Embrace your inner good boy and embark on your quest.
